title: I received my pixel 3 without the glass protection of rear camera.
content:
Hello Google Support,

I received my phone (Google Pixel 3, awesome phone ) without the protection glass of the rear camera.
When i complain at the retailer, they told me that is my fault, and don't take it back for warranty and put another glass and don't wanna chat for more. I hope you can help me, because it's the 4rd  time I'm writing to you.

Have a nice day,
Cosmin Guiu.
